CustomField.formula:
/*IF(BLANKVALUE(TECH_LV_LOCALE__c,'eng-e1') == 'zhs-cn', $CustomMetadata.WRDB_LVCOM_URL__mdt.LVCOM_HOST_URL_CHINA.Path__c , $CustomMetadata.WRDB_LVCOM_URL__mdt.LVCOM_HOST_URL_WW.Path__c ) + '/'+ BLANKVALUE(TECH_LV_LOCALE__c,'eng-e1')+ '/'+ $CustomMetadata.WRDB_LVCOM_URL__mdt.LVCOM_PATH.Path__c + '/' + BLANKVALUE( TECH_LV_PAGE_NAME__c ,'recommendations') + '/' + CASESAFEID(Id) +IF(ISBLANK(TECH_LV_DISPATCH_COUNTRY__c),'', '?dispatchCountry='+TECH_LV_DISPATCH_COUNTRY__c ) +'&campaign=look_'+Id+'&A=DreamId'*/
IF(BLANKVALUE(TECH_LV_LOCALE__c,'eng-e1')=='zhs-cn',$CustomMetadata.WRDB_LVCOM_URL__mdt.LVCOM_HOST_URL_CHINA.Path__c , $CustomMetadata.WRDB_LVCOM_URL__mdt.LVCOM_HOST_URL_WW.Path__c ) + '/'+ BLANKVALUE(TECH_LV_LOCALE__c,'eng-e1')+ '/'+ $CustomMetadata.WRDB_LVCOM_URL__mdt.LVCOM_PATH.Path__c + '/' + BLANKVALUE( TECH_LV_PAGE_NAME__c ,'recommendations') + '/' + BLANKVALUE(TECH_EnCrypted_LookId__c, CASESAFEID(Id)) +IF(ISBLANK(TECH_LV_DISPATCH_COUNTRY__c),'', '?dispatchCountry='+TECH_LV_DISPATCH_COUNTRY__c ) +'&campaign=look_'+TECH_EnCrypted_LookId__c+'&A=DreamId'
CustomField.label: LV URL Sharing
